attributes.action: Give Rangers manager Walter Smith a very well deserved and long over due Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Walter Smith has won more competitions in his 10 years as manager of Rangers, than Sir Fergie has won at Man U in his 22 years, yet he has constantly and deliberatley been overlooked for this honor, by the Celtic loving numpties(John Reid, Des Browne, Tony Blair, Helen Liddel) that have populated the British cabinet for the past 11 years.
It is time to right this wrong, and give Walter his Knighthood.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
